lgp.core.evolution.operators

Class RecombinationOperator<TProgram,TOutput extends Output<TProgram>>

  • lgp.core.evolution.operators.RecombinationOperator<TProgram,TOutput>
  • Type Parameters:
    TProgram - The type of programs being combined.
    TOutput - The type of the program output(s).
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearCrossover

    public class RecombinationOperator<TProgram,TOutput extends Output<TProgram>>
implements Module

    A search operator used during evolution to combine two individuals from a population.

    The individuals are mutated directly by the reference given, so calls to this function directly modify the arguments.
